fields.value: Supporting Data for: The political economy of substandard and falsified medicines: an evidence-informed risk-assessment framework based on a multi-country study

authorAffiliation.value: London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine

dsDescriptionValue.value: These data provide supplementary information for readers of the draft paper: The political economy of substandard and falsified medicines: an evidence-informed risk-assessment framework based on a multi-country study.

publicationCitation.value: The political economy of substandard and falsified medicines: an evidence-informed risk-assessment framework based on a multi-country study. Submitted draft paper.

value: Supporting data for qualitative study of medicine quality in China, Indonesia, Romania and Turkey.

files.description: This draft paper describes a study of the political and economic forces driving the markets for substandard and falsified medicines in four middle-income countries: China, Indonesia, Romania and Turkey
files.label: 01_Draft_Paper_Pisani_et_al_Political_economy_of_medicine_quality.docx

dataFile.description: This draft paper describes a study of the political and economic forces driving the markets for substandard and falsified medicines in four middle-income countries: China, Indonesia, Romania and Turkey

files.description: This video provides a narrated walk-through of a framework that uses political economy analysis to assess the risk of substandard or falsified medicines entering a national market.
files.label: 02_Medicine_quality_risk_assesment_narrated_video.mov

dataFile.description: This video provides a narrated walk-through of a framework that uses political economy analysis to assess the risk of substandard or falsified medicines entering a national market.

files.description: This video summarises the risks posed to the quality of medicines as Indonesia rapidly scales up its national health insurance programme.
files.label: 03_Medicine_quality_in_Indonesia.mov

dataFile.description: This video summarises the risks posed to the quality of medicines as Indonesia rapidly scales up its national health insurance programme.

files.description:
These data provide supplementary information for the paper "The political economy of substandard and falsified medicines: an evidence-informed risk-assessment framework based on a multi-country study" by Pisani et al. 

We provide an annotated version of the medicine quality risk assessment framework based on case studies in Indonesia, Turkey and Romania
files.label: 07_Pisani_medicine_quality_Country_Annex.pdf

dataFile.description:
These data provide supplementary information for the paper "The political economy of substandard and falsified medicines: an evidence-informed risk-assessment framework based on a multi-country study" by Pisani et al. 

We provide an annotated version of the medicine quality risk assessment framework based on case studies in Indonesia, Turkey and Romania

files.description:
These data provide supplementary information for the paper "The political economy of substandard and falsified medicines: an evidence-informed risk-assessment framework based on a multi-country study" by Pisani et al. 

We provide an annotated version of the medicine quality risk assessment framework illustrating the pathways through which specific substandard and falsified medicines came to market in the United States of America, Pakistan, and the Democratic Republic of Congo.
files.label: 08_Pisani_medicine_quality_GSMS_Annex.pdf

dataFile.description:
These data provide supplementary information for the paper "The political economy of substandard and falsified medicines: an evidence-informed risk-assessment framework based on a multi-country study" by Pisani et al. 

We provide an annotated version of the medicine quality risk assessment framework illustrating the pathways through which specific substandard and falsified medicines came to market in the United States of America, Pakistan, and the Democratic Republic of Congo.

files.description: This provides the NVivo coding structure and log file of changes to code for data associated with the literature review and country case studies.
files.label: 09_Medicine_quality_coding_structure.docx

dataFile.description: This provides the NVivo coding structure and log file of changes to code for data associated with the literature review and country case studies.

files.description: This file contains bibliographic data for over 840 references relevant to substandard and falsified medicines, for download into reference management software. It accompanies the paper "The political economy of substandard and falsified medicines: an evidence-informed risk-assessment framework based on a multi-country study" by Pisani et al.
files.label: 10_Medicine_quality_bibliography.ris

dataFile.description: This file contains bibliographic data for over 840 references relevant to substandard and falsified medicines, for download into reference management software. It accompanies the paper "The political economy of substandard and falsified medicines: an evidence-informed risk-assessment framework based on a multi-country study" by Pisani et al.

files.description: This supplements the methods section of the paper "The political economy of substandard and falsified medicines". It provides additional details on the researcher backgrounds, interviewee characteristics and interview settings, in accordance with the COREQ guidelines for the reporting of qualitative research.
files.label: 11_COREQ_medicine_quality_study_info_form.docx

dataFile.description: This supplements the methods section of the paper "The political economy of substandard and falsified medicines". It provides additional details on the researcher backgrounds, interviewee characteristics and interview settings, in accordance with the COREQ guidelines for the reporting of qualitative research.
